trans-unit.source: Serves as the base class for all zone controls that act as containers for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> (or other server or user) controls.
trans-unit.target: 用作所有区域作为容器的控件的基类<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> （或其他服务器或用户） 控件。

trans-unit.source: In the Web Parts control set, a zone is a composite control, rendered as an HTML table, that contains other controls in a defined region of a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Web 部件控件集，在区域是一个复合控件，呈现为 HTML 表，包含 Web 页的已定义的范围中的其他控件。

trans-unit.source: The WebPartZoneBase class is a zone that inherits from the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> class and provides a base set of behaviors for derived zones that contain <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, server controls, and user controls.
trans-unit.target: WebPartZoneBase 类是一个继承自基类的区域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>类，并提供一组基本的行为的派生区域包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件、 服务器控件和用户控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>

trans-unit.source: The combination of WebPartZoneBase zones with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> (and other server) controls forms the primary UI of a Web Parts application, the normal view of a page that users interact with most of the time.
trans-unit.target: 使用区域的 WebPartZoneBase 组合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>（和其他服务器） 控件窗体的 Web 部件应用程序，用户与大多数情况下进行交互的页的普通视图的主 UI。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: All zones provide a common set of UI elements for the controls they contain.
trans-unit.target: 所有区域为它们包含的控件都提供一组通用的 UI 元素。

trans-unit.source: For a detailed discussion of the UI elements common to all zones, see the class overview topic for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> class.
trans-unit.target: UI 元素共有的所有区域的详细讨论，请参阅类概述主题面向<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>类。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartZoneBase zone includes a body section that contains server controls, and an associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> object used for rendering the contained controls and their chrome elements, such as their verbs, borders, and so on.
trans-unit.target: WebPartZoneBase 区域包括包含服务器控件和一个关联的正文部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>用于呈现所包含的控件和其 chrome 元素中的，例如其谓词、 边框和等等的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>

trans-unit.source: In addition to the features inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> class, the WebPartZoneBase class adds client-side control dragging, specific verbs (to enable common UI actions such as minimizing, closing, deleting, and editing controls), and additional style features.
trans-unit.target: 除了从继承的功能<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>类，此 WebPartZoneBase 类添加客户端控件拖动、 特定谓词 （以启用公共用户界面操作如最小化、 关闭、 删除和编辑控件） 和其他样式特征。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartZoneBase class is also the class to inherit from if you want to design a custom zone that is database-driven.
trans-unit.target: WebPartZoneBase 类也是如果你想要设计自定义时区，则数据库驱动从继承的类。

trans-unit.source: For example, you could create a custom weather Web Parts zone that inherits from WebPartZoneBase, and is designed to contain and provide layout features and other services for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls that are data-bound and display weather information.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可以创建 Web 部件区域继承自 WebPartZoneBase，且旨在包含并提供布局功能和其他服务的自定义天气<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件是数据绑定控件并显示天气信息。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartZoneBase class contains a number of properties for working with style attributes in a zone.
trans-unit.target: WebPartZoneBase 类包含多个用于处理区域中的样式特性的属性。

trans-unit.source: There are several properties for borders, including <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderWidth%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有几个属性的边框，包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderWidth%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderWidth%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.BorderStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: There is a group of properties for working with style attributes of menus that can appear in the header of a zone, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuLabelStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuVerbStyle%2A>, and others.
trans-unit.target: 没有一组用于处理可以如区域的标头中出现的菜单的样式特性的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuLabelStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuVerbStyle%2A>，和其他人。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuVerbStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MenuLabelStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartZoneBase class also contains a number of members for handling verbs in a zone.
trans-unit.target: WebPartZoneBase 类还包含大量成员，用于处理区域中的谓词。

trans-unit.source: These members relate to the verbs that appear on the part controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: 这些成员关联的区域中的部件控件显示的谓词。

trans-unit.source: While zone-level verbs can be added to WebPartZoneBase zones, by default they do not have any.
trans-unit.target: 虽然可以到 WebPartZoneBase 区域添加区域级别的谓词，但是默认情况下它们没有任何。

trans-unit.source: There is a set of standard verbs provided with the Web Parts control set for use with part controls, and developers can add custom verbs as well.
trans-unit.target: 还有一组提供的 Web 部件控件集用于部件控件的标准谓词和开发人员可以添加自定义谓词以及。

trans-unit.source: Some important properties for working with verbs include properties that reference some of the standard verb objects, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ConnectVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DeleteVerb%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditVerb%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HelpVerb%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeVerb%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 用于处理谓词的一些重要属性包括如引用的某些标准谓词对象的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ConnectVerb%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DeleteVerb%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditVerb%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HelpVerb%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeVerb%2A>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.MinimizeVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.HelpVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DeleteVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ConnectVerb%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseVerb%2A>

trans-unit.source: The standard verbs appear on a verbs menu (typically presented in the UI as a drop-down menu) in the title bar of each control contained in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 标准谓词 （通常为下拉列表菜单界面中显示） 谓词菜单上显示的区域中包含每个控件的标题栏中。

trans-unit.source: There is also a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A> property that allows you to determine what type of clickable object represents a verb in the UI.
trans-unit.target: 此外，还有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A>属性，它允许你确定哪种类型的可单击的对象表示 UI 中的谓词。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.VerbButtonType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other key members for working with verbs include the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A> method, which is an event handler that can be overridden for custom handling of the verb creation process, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs> event.
trans-unit.target: 用于处理谓词其他键成员包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A>方法，即可以自定义处理的谓词创建过程中被重写一个事件处理程序和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateVerbs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.OnCreateVerbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartZoneBase class contains a number of members for working with <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls contained within a zone.
trans-unit.target: WebPartZoneBase 类用于处理包含大量成员<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>区域中包含的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A> property references the collection of all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> (and other server) controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A>属性引用的所有集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>（和其他服务器） 的区域中的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A>

trans-unit.source: Several methods correspond to the standard verbs or actions that a user can carry out on <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in a zone, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseWebPart%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ConnectWebPart%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditWebPart%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以执行上的标准谓词或操作的几个方法对应<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件在区域中，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseWebPart%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ConnectWebPart%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditWebPart%2A>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.EditWebPart%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.ConnectWebPart%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseWebPart%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: There are also a number of members in the WebPartZoneBase class that concern how the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls are laid out or arranged within the zone.
trans-unit.target: 此外还有大量的 WebPartZoneBase 中的成员类关于如何<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>布局或该区域中排列控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A> property determines whether controls can be moved among zones or rearranged within a zone by users.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A>属性确定控件是否可以在区域之间移动或重新排列在区域内的用户。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A> property allows you to determine whether the controls in a zone are arranged horizontally or vertically.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A>属性允许您确定是否在水平或垂直排列区域中的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Internet Explorer might render the height of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone> or its contained controls in an unexpected way, depending on the orientation of the zone.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> Internet 资源管理器可能呈现的高度<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>或其包含的控件以意想不到的方式，具体取决于该区域的方向。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>

trans-unit.source: For more details, see the documentation for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A> or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅的文档<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.LayoutOrientation%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other methods in the WebPartZoneBase class provide you with detailed programmatic control over the rendering of the various areas of a zone.
trans-unit.target: WebPartZoneBase 类中的其他方法可为你提供对各个区域的区域呈现详细进行编程控制。

trans-unit.source: Many of these methods override the base methods inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> class, to customize the rendering for zones that contain <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 许多这些方法重写继承自基方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>类中，以自定义的包含的区域的呈现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>

trans-unit.source: Important methods include <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.Render%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderBody%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderDropCue%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderHeader%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 重要的方法包括<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.Render%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderBody%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderDropCue%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderHeader%2A>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderHeader%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderDropCue%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.RenderBody%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.Render%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化继承的类实例使用的类。

trans-unit.source: This constructor can only be called by an inherited class.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数只能由继承的类调用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the layout of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls can be changed within a zone.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否的布局<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件可以更改在区域内。

trans-unit.source: The AllowLayoutChange property takes effect only when a zone is in a page display mode in which the layout of controls in the zone can be changed, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: AllowLayoutChange 属性才会生效，仅当区域中顺序的区域中的控件布局可以更改，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>的页面显示模式

trans-unit.source: When AllowLayoutChange is set to `false` on a given zone, there are a number of actions that end users are prevented from carrying out on controls in the zone: - Users cannot drag controls to a different zone, rearrange controls within the zone, or move controls into the zone.
trans-unit.target: 当 AllowLayoutChange 设置为`false`位于给定区域，所以有大量，阻止最终用户在该区域中控件上执行的操作:-用户不能将控件拖动到不同的区域、 重新排列控件在该区域，或将控件移到该区域。

trans-unit.source: - A number of properties that affect the user interface (UI) of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in the zone are disabled so that users cannot edit those properties while the control is being edited using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart> controls..
trans-unit.target: -A 有大量的用户界面 (UI) 影响的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>区域中的控件被禁用，以便用户无法编辑这些属性时所使用的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart>控件..</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.BehaviorEditorPart></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.AppearanceEditorPart>编辑的控件</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>的属性

trans-unit.source: - Users cannot add new controls to the zone from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart> control.
trans-unit.target: -用户不能将新控件添加到区域中，从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPart>

trans-unit.source: - The close, delete, minimize, and restore verbs are not shown on controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: -关闭、 删除、 最小化，并还原谓词不会显示在该区域中控件。

trans-unit.source: Although the AllowLayoutChange property affects end users' ability to change the layout of a zone through the UI, it does not affect the ability to change the layout programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 尽管 AllowLayoutChange 属性会影响最终用户能够更改通过 UI 区域的布局，但它不会影响能够以编程方式更改布局。

trans-unit.source: For example, if AllowLayoutChange is set to `false`, users cannot close controls in the zone, but a developer could still call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseWebPart%2A> method to close controls programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果 AllowLayoutChange 设置为`false`，用户无法关闭该区域中的控件，但开发人员仍可以调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseWebPart%2A>方法来关闭以编程方式控制。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CloseWebPart%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the layout can be changed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果可以更改布局;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color for the border of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的边框的颜色<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A> property is overridden by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class to set a default color for zone borders.
trans-unit.target: 基<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A>通过重写属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>类来设置区域边框的默认颜色。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.BorderColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set the BorderColor property for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> control either declaratively or programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 你可以设置的 BorderColor 属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>控制以声明方式或以编程方式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The border appears only when the zone is in a page display mode in which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class user interface (UI) features are visible, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> object that enables end users to close the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 获取对<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref>对象，它启用最终用户关闭<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>区域中的控件。

trans-unit.source: The close verb referenced by the CloseVerb property appears in the verbs menu of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 关闭由 CloseVerb 属性引用的谓词出现在每个谓词菜单<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>区域中的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Closing a control removes it from interaction on a page, although if developers provide the appropriate user interface (UI), such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> zone that contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> control, a user can switch the page into <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode> and add a previously closed instance of a control back to the page.
trans-unit.target: 关闭控件将其删除从交互在页中，虽然如果开发人员提供相应的用户界面 (UI)，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>包含区域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>控件，用户可以切换到页<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>并将控件的以前关闭的实例添加回页面。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> that enables end users to close <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> ，使最终用户可以关闭<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Closes a selected <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 关闭所选<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>区域中的控件。

trans-unit.source: The typical way for an end user to close a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is by clicking the close verb in the control's title bar.
trans-unit.target: 适用于最终用户关闭的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件是通过单击控件的标题栏中的关闭谓词</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>的典型方法

trans-unit.source: The CloseWebPart method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseWebPart%2A> method on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> class, which carries out the action of closing the control.
trans-unit.target: CloseWebPart 方法调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseWebPart%2A>方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>类，该类执行的操作的控件右大括号。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CloseWebPart%2A>

trans-unit.source: The method should only be used by derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.
trans-unit.target: 该方法仅应由派生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>区域</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>使用

trans-unit.source: A closed <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is not rendered on a page.
trans-unit.target: 关闭<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件不呈现在页上。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Instead, it is added to the page catalog, which maintains a list of all closed controls on a page.
trans-unit.target: 相反，它被添加到页目录中，保留在页面上的所有已关闭的控件的列表。

trans-unit.source: If a Web Parts page on which a user closes a control also has an `<asp:PageCatalogPart>` element declared with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>, then the user can switch the page into catalog display mode, and add the closed control back to the page.
trans-unit.target: 如果 Web 部件页，用户在其关闭控件还具有`<asp:PageCatalogPart>`元素可以使用声明<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>，则用户可以将页切换到目录的显示模式，并将已关闭的控件添加回页面。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > For a user to be able to close a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A> property on the control and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A> property on the zone must both be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 用户能够关闭<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A>在控件上的属性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A>区域上的属性必须同时设置为`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control to be closed.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref>即将关闭的控件。

trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> object that enables end users to create connections between <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: 获取对<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref>对象，它启用最终用户之间创建连接<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> that creates a connection between two <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref>创建两个之间的连接<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Initiates the process of creating a connection between two <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: 启动该过程的两个之间创建连接<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The ConnectWebPart method can be called only when the page is in connect display mode (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode>).
trans-unit.target: 仅当页面处于连接的显示模式时，可以调用 ConnectWebPart 方法 (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode>)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: The method in turn calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartConnecting%2A> method, which completes the several steps necessary to fully connect two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 反过来，该方法调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartConnecting%2A>方法，后者会完成完全连接两个所需的几个步骤<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BeginWebPartConnecting%2A>

trans-unit.source: The method should only be used by derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.
trans-unit.target: 该方法仅应由派生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>区域</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>使用

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control that initiates the connection with another selected <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref>启动的连接与另一个选定的控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: Creates the set of child controls contained in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 创建组子区域中包含的控件。

trans-unit.source: The CreateChildControls method overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateChildControls%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to create the set of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls contained in a zone.
trans-unit.target: CreateChildControls 方法重写基<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateChildControls%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法创建的一套<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>区域中包含的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateChildControls%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This occurs when the Web Parts page is in design mode, because the layout of the controls on the page (and within zones) can be changed in design mode.
trans-unit.target: 发生这种情况时 Web 部件页处于设计模式中，因为可以在设计模式下更改控件在页上 （和区域中） 的布局。

trans-unit.source: The set of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls within a zone must likewise be created to accommodate possible changes in the order or occurrence of controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: 一套<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>同样必须创建区域中的控件以适应按顺序或区域中控件的匹配项的可能更改。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> object that contains all the controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref>包含区域中的所有控件的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"></xref> that contains references to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlCollection"> </xref>包含对引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>区域中的控件。

trans-unit.source: Creates a set of style characteristics that apply to a zone control when it is visible.
trans-unit.target: 创建一组可见时应用于区域控件的样式特征。

trans-unit.source: The CreateControlStyle method creates a set of standard style attributes that apply to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones.
trans-unit.target: CreateControlStyle 方法创建的一组标准样式特性应用于<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>区域。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The style attributes apply only when a page is in a display mode in which a zone itself is visible, such as catalog, edit, or design display mode.
trans-unit.target: 仅当页面处于区域本身当中处于可见的例如目录、 编辑或设计的显示模式的显示模式时才应用的样式特性。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that contains style attributes for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref>包含样式特性<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the verbs are created for a zone that derives from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 为派生自的区域创建谓词时发生<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Page developers can add a handler to this event, and attach additional custom verbs to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> child zone.
trans-unit.target: 页开发人员可以将处理程序添加到此事件，并附加到的其他自定义谓词<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>子区域。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The CreateVerbs event is raised when the verbs are created for a zone, which happens either during the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender> stage of page processing, or during postback events.
trans-unit.target: 为一个区域，请创建谓词时引发 CreateVerbs 事件发生<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>阶段的页处理负载，或在回发事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Enables derived zones to substitute a custom <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"></xref> object to change the appearance of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 允许派生的区域，以替换自定义<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"></xref>对象更改的外观<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>区域中的控件。

trans-unit.source: Web Parts chrome refers to the peripheral user interface (UI) elements that frame each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Web 部件 chrome 指帧每的外围设备的用户界面 (UI) 元素<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>区域中的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The chrome for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control includes its border, its title bar, and the icons, title text, and verbs menu that appear within the title bar.
trans-unit.target: 为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件包含其边框、 标题栏、 和图标、 标题文本和谓词，在标题栏中显示的菜单</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>chrome

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the chrome is set at the zone level, and applies to all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: Chrome 的外观设置在区域级别和适用于所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>区域中的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> object affects the entire rendering of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, not merely their chrome elements.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>对象会影响整个呈现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，而不仅仅是其 chrome 元素。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>

trans-unit.source: To use the CreateWebPartChrome method, you must create a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> object to define the appearance of the chrome for Web Parts controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用 CreateWebPartChrome 方法，你必须创建自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>对象可以在区域中定义的 Web 部件控件 chrome 的外观。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>

trans-unit.source: You must also create a custom zone that inherits from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class and overrides the CreateWebPartChrome method to be able to substitute your custom chrome object and apply it to the controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: 你还必须创建继承自一个自定义区域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>类并重写 CreateWebPartChrome 方法能够替换你自定义 chrome 对象并将其应用到该区域中的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"></xref> that determines how <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a zone are rendered.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"> </xref> ，它确定如何<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>呈现区域中的控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> object that enables end users to delete the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 获取对<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref>对象，它启用最终用户能够删除<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>区域中的控件。

trans-unit.source: The delete verb referenced by the DeleteVerb property appears in the verbs drop-down menu in the title bar of each dynamic <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 由 DeleteVerb 属性引用的 delete 谓词都会出现在每个动态的标题栏中的谓词下拉列表菜单<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>区域中的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The delete verb is not available on static controls (controls declared in the markup of the Web page).
trans-unit.target: 删除谓词不是可在静态控件 （在网页上的标记中声明） 上的。

trans-unit.source: The verb appears in the verbs menu only when the page is in a display mode that enables you to change the page layout, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: 该谓词都会出现谓词菜单中的页时才在使你能够更改页面布局，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>的显示模式

trans-unit.source: Deleting a control permanently removes the instance of that control from a page.
trans-unit.target: 永久删除控件从一个页面中删除该控件的实例。

trans-unit.source: Unlike a closed control, a deleted instance of a control can never be added back to a page.
trans-unit.target: 与关闭的控件，永远不会返回到页添加控件的已删除的实例。

trans-unit.source: When a user deletes a control, and then switches a page into <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> zone contains a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> control, the deleted control instance is not available in it.
trans-unit.target: 当用户删除控件，然后切换到页<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone>区域包含的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart>控件，已删除的控件实例是不可用于它。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PageCatalogPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogZone> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: The user can add a new instance of a control, if the control is available in the catalog, but the deleted instance has been permanently removed.
trans-unit.target: 如果控制可在目录中，但已被永久移除已删除的实例，用户可以添加一个控件的新实例。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> that enables end users to delete <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> ，使最终用户可以删除<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Deletes a selected <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 删除所选<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>区域中的控件。

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWebPart%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, and if `webPart` is static, an exception is thrown because static controls (controls that are declared in the markup of a Web page) cannot be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWebPart%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，并且如果`webPart`是静态的将引发异常因为静态控件 （在网页上的标记中声明的控件） 不能被删除。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DeleteWebPart%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The method should only be used by derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.
trans-unit.target: 该方法仅应由派生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>区域</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>使用

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control to be deleted.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref>要删除的控件。

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the current value of the text being used as the title for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> zone when the zone itself is visible.
trans-unit.target: 获取用作的标题的文本的当前值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref>区域的区域本身当中时可见。

trans-unit.source: The DisplayTitle property either gets its value from the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderText%2A> property or, if that value is `null`, uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> value for the zone.
trans-unit.target: DisplayTitle 属性可以获取其值的基<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderText%2A>属性或如果此值为`null`，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>区域的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderText%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the title text for a zone.
trans-unit.target: 包含区域的标题文本的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The default is the value of the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderText*> property.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是基的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderText*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderText*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls can be dragged into or out of a zone.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件可以拖放入 （出） 区域。

trans-unit.source: The DragDropEnabled property indicates whether <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls can be dragged into or out of a zone at run time.
trans-unit.target: DragDropEnabled 属性指示是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件可以拖动到或跳出区域在运行时。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The property is used specifically for checking whether the page is in a page display mode that allows drag-and-drop editing, and whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 属性专门用于检查是否正在允许拖放编辑的页显示模式下的页以及是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A>属性设置为`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.AllowLayoutChange%2A>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether controls can be dragged.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，该值指示是否可拖动控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color around the border of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> zone and its drop-cue regions when a user is dragging a control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置边框四周的颜色<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref>区域和用户拖动控件时其放置提示区域。

trans-unit.source: When a dragged control is held over a zone where it can be dropped, drop-cue regions appear, showing the area in which the control can be dropped, and it is for these regions, as well as the zone itself, that the DragHighlightColor property affects the border color.
trans-unit.target: 当拖动的控件是通过它可放置位置，显示放置提示区域，显示在其中可以删除控件，并且在这些区域的区域的区域以及 DragHighlightColor 属性会影响的边框颜色的区域本身当中，持有。

trans-unit.source: The DragHighlightColor property enables you to set the color that appears to a user when they drag a control in the zone.
trans-unit.target: DragHighlightColor 属性可以设置所显示的颜色为用户，当它们在区域中拖动控件。

trans-unit.source: The DragHighlightColor property takes effect only when a Web page is in a display mode that enables the layout of a zone to be changed, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: DragHighlightColor 属性仅在 Web 页处于启用要进行更改，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>的区域的布局的显示模式时，才起作用

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that contains the highlight color.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> ，其中包含的突出显示颜色。

trans-unit.source: The default color is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Blue*>.
trans-unit.target: 默认颜色是<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Blue*>.</xref:System.Drawing.Color.Blue*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> object that enables end users to edit <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 获取对<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref>对象，它启用最终用户能够编辑<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>区域中的控件。

trans-unit.source: The edit verb referenced by the EditVerb property on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> control enables an end user to switch a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in the zone into edit mode, where the user can personalize the appearance, properties, layout, and content of the control.
trans-unit.target: 该属性引用的 EditVerb 上的编辑谓词<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>控件允许最终用户若要切换<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>处于编辑模式，其中用户可以个性化外观、 属性、 布局和的控件内容的区域中控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The same edit verb is used for all controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 相同的编辑谓词用于区域中的所有控件。

trans-unit.source: When a Web Parts page enters into the edit display mode (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>), the edit verb becomes visible in the verbs menu of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control contained in the zone.
trans-unit.target: Web 部件页在进入到编辑显示模式 (<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>)，编辑谓词变得可见的谓词菜单中的每个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>该区域中包含的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> that enables end users to edit <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> ，使最终用户可以编辑<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Initiates the process of editing a selected <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 启动该过程的编辑所选<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>区域中的控件。

trans-unit.source: The method should only be used by derived <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zones such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.
trans-unit.target: 该方法仅应由派生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZone>区域</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>使用

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control to be edited.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref>要编辑的控件。

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a message that appears when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> control contains no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置时，会出现一条消息<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref>控件不包含任何<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The EmptyZoneText property overrides the base property to distinguish between cases where the property has not been set and those where it has been set to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: EmptyZoneText 属性重写基属性，以区分属性尚未设置的情况下，以及它已设置为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: If the property has not been set and the zone contains no controls, when a Web Parts page enters into a display mode where the zone is visible, a default culture-specific text message appears in an empty <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置的属性且区域不包含任何控件，Web 部件页面输入的显示模式向该区域是可见，则默认区域性特定的文本消息都将出现在一个空<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: If the EmptyZoneText property value has intentionally been set to an empty string, then no text message appears in an empty zone.
trans-unit.target: 如果有意具有已 EmptyZoneText 属性值设置为一个空字符串，然后在空区域中会出现没有文本消息。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the message that appears in an empty zone.
trans-unit.target: 包含空区域中显示的消息的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A default culture-specific string is supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 由.NET Framework 提供的默认区域性特定字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> object that enables end users to export an XML definition file for each <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 获取对<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref>对象，它启用最终用户能够为每个导出 XML 定义文件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>区域中的控件。

trans-unit.source: The export verb referenced by the ExportVerb property appears in the verbs drop-down menu within the title bar of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 由 ExportVerb 属性引用的导出谓词都会出现在每个的标题栏中的谓词下拉列表菜单<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>区域中的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The verb appears in the verbs menu in all page display modes.
trans-unit.target: 该谓词都会出现在所有页面显示模式中的谓词菜单中。

trans-unit.source: To enable users to export a definition file for a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, you must also set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A> property on a control to something other than its default value, which is <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode>.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用户能够导出为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件，还必须设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A>为其默认值，即<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartExportMode>以外的内容控件属性</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ExportMode%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>的定义文件

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> that enables end users to export a definition file for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> ，使最终用户可以导出的定义文件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the actual or effective current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"></xref> value of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control, given the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeType*> property of the zone and the current display mode of the Web Parts page.
trans-unit.target: 返回实际或有效当前<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"></xref>值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>给定控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeType*>该区域的 Web 部件页的当前显示模式的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeType*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part"></xref> control for which the zone needs to retrieve the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType*> setting.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part"> </xref>控件区域需要为其检索当前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType*>设置。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.Part.ChromeType*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"></xref> value that contains the kind of border that currently frames Web Parts controls contained by a zone.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"> </xref>当前包含的边框类型的值包含的区域的 Web 部件控件框。

trans-unit.source: Gets an initial collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls contained in a zone, based on a template or some storage medium.
trans-unit.target: 获取的初始集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>区域中包含的控件基于模板或某些存储介质中。

trans-unit.source: The GetInitialWebParts method gets the initial collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls for a zone only if there is a preexisting template or other form of storage that determines what controls are in the zone.
trans-unit.target: GetInitialWebParts 方法获取的初始集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制为区域，仅当没有预先存在的模板或其他形式的存储，用于确定在区域中的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The method does not reflect any personalization changes, which might mean that controls in the initial collection have actually been moved by a user into another zone.
trans-unit.target: 该方法不会反映任何个性化修改，这可能意味着，初始集合中的控件实际上已移用户到另一个区域。

trans-unit.source: The initial collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in the zone are not necessarily the same as the collection contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A> property of the zone, which reflects the actual current collection of controls in the zone when a page is rendered, taking into account any personalization changes that have been made.
trans-unit.target: 初始集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>区域中的控件并不一定中包含的集合相同<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A>区域，呈现页面时，考虑到已做的任何个性化设置更改时，可以反映的区域中的控件的实际当前集合的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebParts%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection"></xref> that contains the initial set of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls that belong in a zone.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartCollection"> </xref>包含的初始集<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>属于某个区域的控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a zone has a footer area.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否区域具有页脚区域。

trans-unit.source: The HasFooter property overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasFooter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to set the default value to `false` for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> controls.
trans-unit.target: HasFooter 属性重写基<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasFooter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性将默认值设置为`false`为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasFooter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the zone has a footer area; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该区域具有页脚区域，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a zone has a header area.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否区域具有标题区域。

trans-unit.source: The HasHeader property overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasHeader%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to set the default value to `false` for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> controls when the page display mode is in normal <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode>.
trans-unit.target: HasHeader 属性重写基<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasHeader%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性将默认值设置为`false`的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>控件时的页面显示模式处于正常<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HasHeader%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If a Web Parts page is in one of the display modes that allow page design, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>, then the value of the HasHeader property is `true`, so that the specified zone can display header user interface (UI) elements.
trans-unit.target: Web 部件页是否允许页设计，如显示模式之一中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode>，HasHeader 属性的值则`true`，以便指定的区域可以显示标头用户界面 (UI) 元素。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.CatalogDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.EditDisplayMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DesignDisplayMode>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the zone has a header area; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该区域具有页眉区域，则否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> when the page is in normal <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>当页面处于正常<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.BrowseDisplayMode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> object used to access Help content for <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 获取对<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref>对象用于访问帮助内容<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>区域中的控件。

trans-unit.source: The HelpVerb property can be accessed either declaratively or programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 以声明方式或以编程方式，可以访问 HelpVerb 属性。

trans-unit.source: You can access it declaratively within a zone by using the `<asp:HelpVerb>` element to set the text, the description, whether the verb is enabled, and other attributes.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过访问它以声明方式在区域内使用`<asp:HelpVerb>`元素中设置文本、 说明、 是否已启用的谓词，以及其他特性。

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to declare a help verb for a zone, however, because it is enabled by default.
trans-unit.target: 它不需要声明一个区域，但是，帮助谓词，因为默认情况下启用。

trans-unit.source: The only step that is necessary to enable a help verb to appear on the verbs menu of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in a zone at run time is to assign a value to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpUrl%2A> property for individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: 为了使帮助谓词能够显示在的谓词菜单上是必需的唯一步骤<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>在运行时区域中的控件是将值赋给<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpUrl%2A>属性为各个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.HelpUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"></xref> that enables users to access Help content on the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb"> </xref> ，使用户可以访问帮助内容的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>区域中的控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether controls in a zone are arranged vertically or horizontally.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在垂直或水平排列区域中的控件。

trans-unit.source: The LayoutOrientation property concerns how Web Parts controls are laid out in a zone.
trans-unit.target: LayoutOrientation 属性涉及 Web 部件控件区域中的布局方式。

trans-unit.source: With the default <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation> orientation, the controls are rendered in a top-to-bottom arrangement, according to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A> value of each control.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation>方向，将控件呈现从上到下排列中, 根据<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A>的每个控件的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.ZoneIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation>

trans-unit.source: With a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation> orientation, the controls are arranged side by side, subject to the width of the zone.
trans-unit.target: 与<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation>方向，控件排列并排显示、 主题区域的宽度。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation>

trans-unit.source: Internet Explorer can affect the height of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, and the height of the zone that contains it.
trans-unit.target: Internet 资源管理器可能会影响的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件和小标题的高度，该字符串包含它。 该区域</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>的高度

trans-unit.source: Internet Explorer renders web pages either in compatibility mode (backward compatible with previous browser versions), or in standards mode (determined by the presence of a `DOCTYPE` declaration in the page).
trans-unit.target: Internet Explorer 呈现在兼容性模式下 （与以前的浏览器版本向后兼容），或在标准模式下的网页 (由存在`DOCTYPE`在页中的声明)。

trans-unit.source: For information about these modes, see the DHTML [compatMode](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=57175) property.
trans-unit.target: 有关这些模式的信息，请参阅 DHTML [compatMode](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=57175)属性。

trans-unit.source: When Internet Explorer renders a page in standards mode, in some scenarios it does not resize cells in tables, even when a cell's HTML markup is `<td height="100%">`.
trans-unit.target: 当 Internet Explorer 呈现标准模式中的页时，在某些情况下它并没有进行调整单元格在表中，即使在单元格的 HTML 标记`<td height="100%">`。

trans-unit.source: As a result, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls and their containing zone are rendered so that the controls do not stretch to the full height of the zone.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件和其包含的区域呈现，因此，控件不会拉伸到该区域的最大高度。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: This type of rendering occurs in two cases.
trans-unit.target: 在两个情况下发生这种类型的呈现。

trans-unit.source: - When a zone's LayoutOrientation property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation>, and you explicitly set the height on the zone.
trans-unit.target: -当区域的 LayoutOrientation 属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation>，且在区域上显式设置的高度。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation>

trans-unit.source: To enable controls to fill the full height of the zone, do not specify the height of a horizontal zone.
trans-unit.target: 要使控件能够填充区域的最大高度，不要指定水平区域的高度。

trans-unit.source: - When a zone's LayoutOrientation property is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation>, and you do not explicitly set the height of the zone (or of the contained controls).
trans-unit.target: -当区域的 LayoutOrientation 属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation>，并且未显式设置区域 （或包含的控件） 的高度。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation>

trans-unit.source: To enable controls to fill the full height of the zone, set the height of the zone or of the controls in a vertical zone.
trans-unit.target: 若要使控件能够填充区域的最大高度，垂直区域中设置的区域或控件的高度。

trans-unit.source: The code example in this topic demonstrates normal usage of the LayoutOrientation property.
trans-unit.target: 本主题中的代码示例演示如何正常使用 LayoutOrientation 属性。

trans-unit.source: For a code example that demonstrates the height-related rendering issue and how to work around it, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关演示高度相关的呈现问题以及如何解决它的代码示例，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.Height%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation"></xref> value that determines how controls in a zone are arranged.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation"> </xref>值，该值确定区域中的控件的排列方式。

trans-unit.source: The default orientation is <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认方向是<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The value is not one of the enumerated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 值不是枚举之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Orientation"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Loads previously saved state information for a zone.
trans-unit.target: 加载以前保存的区域的状态信息。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 此方法主要由.NET Framework 基础结构使用，但不可在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: However, you can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: 但是，你可以重写此方法以指定自定义服务器控件还原其视图状态的方式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 状态管理概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The LoadViewState method overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to load state for the verbs and the verbs menu in a zone derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class.
trans-unit.target: LoadViewState 方法重写基<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法为谓词和派生自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>区域中的谓词菜单加载状态</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.LoadViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The previously saved state.
trans-unit.target: 以前保存的状态。

trans-unit.source: The size of the savedState object does not equal the size of the current view-state object.
trans-unit.target: 大小 savedState 对象不等于当前的视图状态对象的大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets style attributes that are applied to the check mark image that appears on a verbs menu next to the selected verb text.
trans-unit.target: 获取应用于在所选的谓词文本旁的谓词菜单显示的复选标记图像的样式特性。

trans-unit.source: The MenuCheckImageStyle property applies only when there is a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> object in a verbs menu that has its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Checked%2A> property value set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 只有在没有自定义时，将应用 MenuCheckImageStyle 属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>中具有的谓词菜单对象其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Checked%2A>属性值设置为`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Checked%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>

trans-unit.source: The style attributes contained in the MenuCheckImageStyle property pertain to the style of the check mark image that appears next to the verb's text in the menu.
trans-unit.target: MenuCheckImageStyle 属性中包含的样式特性适用于显示菜单中的谓词的文本旁边的复选标记图像的样式。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone has its own verbs menu in its title bar.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>区域可拥有其自己在其标题栏中的谓词菜单</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>中的控件</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The verbs menu can contain both standard verbs included in the Web Parts control set, and custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> objects created by developers.
trans-unit.target: 谓词菜单可以包含 Web 部件控件集和自定义中包含两个标准谓词<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>由开发人员创建的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>

trans-unit.source: The standard verbs in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control verbs menu--including the verbs for exporting, deleting, and opening a Help page--are single-action verbs that carry out their tasks once and are done.
trans-unit.target: 中的标准谓词<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件谓词菜单-包括导出、 删除和打开帮助的谓词执行其任务一次并的单次操作谓词完成页 —。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: There is no need to ever mark these verbs in the menu with a check mark, because none of them indicate any sort of continuing state.
trans-unit.target: 存在就无需曾经将标记中的菜单带有复选标记，这些谓词，因为其中任何一个指示任何种类的持续状态。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Checked%2A> property on these verbs cannot be set, and the MenuCheckImageStyle property does not apply to them at all.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Checked%2A>这些谓词的属性不能设置，和 MenuCheckImageStyle 属性不适用于这些根本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Checked%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, developers can create a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> control that might indicate a continuing state with a check mark, by setting its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Checked%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 但是，开发人员可以创建自定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>控件可能表明某种持续状态带有复选标记，通过设置其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Checked%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb.Checked%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that contains the style attributes for check mark images in a verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref>包含谓词菜单中的复选标记图像的样式特性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image used as a check mark in the verbs menu of each <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用作每个谓词菜单中的复选标记的图像的 URL <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref>区域中的控件。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the URL to an image used as a check mark.
trans-unit.target: 表示用作复选标记的图像的 URL 的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets style attributes that are applied to the label of a verbs menu in the title bar of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control when a user positions the mouse pointer over the label.
trans-unit.target: 获取样式应用于的谓词菜单中的标题栏的标签特性的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>控制当用户将鼠标指针定位悬停标签。

trans-unit.source: The MenuLabelHoverStyle property affects the style of the entire label for the verbs menu in each Web Parts control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: MenuLabelHoverStyle 属性会影响区域中每个 Web 部件控件中的谓词菜单的整个标签的样式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that contains the style attributes for the label in a verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref>包含谓词菜单中的标签的样式特性。

trans-unit.source: Gets style information for the label of the verbs drop-down menu that appears in the title bar of each <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 获取样式的谓词下拉列表菜单中的每个标题栏中显示的信息标签<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>区域中的控件。

trans-unit.source: The MenuLabelStyle property affects the style of the label on the verbs menu of each Web Parts control in a zone, regardless of whether the label contains an image, text, or both.
trans-unit.target: MenuLabelStyle 属性会影响区域，而不考虑标签包含图像、 文本或两者中每个 Web 部件控件的谓词菜单上的标签的样式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> that contains style information for the label of the verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"> </xref> ，包含标签的谓词菜单的样式信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value that serves as a label for the verbs drop-down menu in the title bar of each <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用作谓词下拉菜单中的每个标题栏中的标签值<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>区域中的控件。

trans-unit.source: If the MenuLabelText property is assigned a value, the label appears alongside an image that represents the verbs drop-down menu in the title bar of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 如果 MenuLabelText 属性分配一个值，表示每个标题栏中的谓词下拉列表菜单的图像旁边将显示该标签<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>区域中的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: If no value is assigned to the property, only the image appears on the menu.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有值分配给属性，唯一的映像将显示在菜单上。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the text that appears in the label for the verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: 包含在谓词菜单的标签中显示的文本的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to an image that opens the verbs drop-down menu in the title bar of each <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置将在每个标题栏中打开谓词下拉列表菜单的图像 URL <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref>区域中的控件。

trans-unit.source: If no value is assigned to the MenuPopupImageUrl property, a default image that looks like a downward arrow is provided to open the verbs drop-down menu in the title bar of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有值分配给 MenuPopupImageUrl 属性，如下所示的向下箭头的默认映像可用于在标题栏中打开谓词下拉列表菜单<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the URL to an image used to open the verbs drop-down menu.
trans-unit.target: 表示用来打开谓词下拉列表菜单的图像的 URL 的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Gets style attributes for the drop-down verbs menu that appears on <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls in a zone.
trans-unit.target: 获取样式特性将出现在下拉列表谓词菜单<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref>区域中的控件。

trans-unit.source: The MenuPopupStyle property enables you to set style attributes for the drop-down verbs menu that appears on each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control in a zone.
trans-unit.target: MenuPopupStyle 属性使您能够对每个设置下拉谓词出现的菜单中的样式属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>区域中的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: While the object itself is read-only, you can still set values for the underlying attributes.
trans-unit.target: 对象本身是只读的虽然你仍然可以设置基础属性的值。

trans-unit.source: You can set style attributes for the entire menu, such as its border color, style, and width; font details; height and width; background color; cell padding and spacing; shadow color (if shadowing is enabled in the user's operating system); and gridlines.
trans-unit.target: 你可以设置整个菜单上，例如其边框颜色、 样式和宽度; 的样式属性字体的详细信息;高度和宽度;背景色;单元格边距和间距;阴影颜色 （如果在用户的操作系统中启用了阴影）;和网格线。

trans-unit.source: The MenuPopupStyle property applies only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebPartVerbRenderMode%2A> property value is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbRenderMode>, which is the default.
trans-unit.target: MenuPopupStyle 属性适用时，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebPartVerbRenderMode%2A>属性值设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbRenderMode>，这是默认设置。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerbRenderMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.WebPartVerbRenderMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle"></xref> that contains style attributes for the verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartMenuStyle"> </xref>包含谓词菜单的样式特性。

trans-unit.source: Gets style information for the appearance of a verb in a verbs drop-down menu when an end user positions the mouse pointer over the verb.
trans-unit.target: 当最终用户鼠标指针悬停谓词谓词下拉列表菜单中获取外观的谓词的样式的信息。

trans-unit.source: The style information contained in the MenuVerbHoverStyle property applies to an individual verb in a verbs menu, when a user positions a mouse pointer over one of the verbs.
trans-unit.target: 当用户鼠标指针悬停谓词之一，MenuVerbHoverStyle 属性中包含的样式信息适用于谓词菜单中中的单个谓词。

trans-unit.source: Although this property is read-only, you can set the style attributes of the underlying <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object.
trans-unit.target: 尽管此属性是只读的也可设置的基础的样式特性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: Because the menu that contains the verbs is created using Microsoft Internet Explorer's pop-up object, the menu does not correctly render its border when you place your mouse pointer over verbs that have different text lengths.
